resources.string: News Points are calculated based on the number of articles you read. Reading an article gives you one NewsPoint.

Level is based on the news points one accumulate. There are a total of five levels. 

			Noob Master				-				0 < NP < 50 
			Reader								-				50 < NP < 100 
			Front Bencher			-				100 < NP < 300 
			Prodigy								-				300 < NP < 500 
			News Wizard			-				NP > 500 

Make sure you become a news wizard to unlock some interesting features.
